title: Encore: 'The King And The Cobbler'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This week we present a favorite story from the archives: Keith David (Greenleaf) and Tony Award winner James Naughton (City of Angels, Chicago) play a curious, disguised king and a cobbler who proves the power of self-reliance.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Encore: 'The King And The Cobbler'
itunes:summary: This week we present a favorite story from the archives: Keith David (Greenleaf) and Tony Award winner James Naughton (City of Angels, Chicago) play a curious, disguised king and a cobbler who proves the power of self-reliance.
itunes:subtitle: This week, we’re bringing you a favorite Circle Round episodes that’s all about using your imagination and creativity in the face of difficulties and obstacles.
content:encoded: This week we present a favorite story from the archives: Keith David (Greenleaf) and Tony Award winner James Naughton (City of Angels, Chicago) play a curious, disguised king and a cobbler who proves the power of self-reliance.
